H0.text: Who, in 1960, made international news for banging his shoe on a table in the UN. Fidel Castro

H1.text: Who, in 1960, made international news for banging his shoe on a table in the UN. Jawaharlal Nehru

H2.text: Who, in 1960, made international news for banging his shoe on a table in the UN. Charles de Gaulle

H3.text: Who, in 1960, made international news for banging his shoe on a table in the UN. Хрущёв

A4.text: Khrushchev yanked off his shoe and began banging it on his desk.

A5.text: The notorious shoe-banging incident occurred during a debate on 12 October over a Soviet resolution decrying colonialism.
